\chapter*{CardiacSeg}

\section*{List of Paper}

\begin{itemize}
\item \href{https://arxiv.org/abs/2303.17967}{Segmentation with Shape Priors: A Review - TMI2024}
\item Shape-Aware Deep Neural Networks for Biomedical Image Segmentation
\item Anatomically Constrained Neural Networks (ACNN): Application to Cardiac Image Enhancement and Segmentation
\item Learning with Explicit Shape Priors for Medical  Image Segmentation
\item \href{https://openaccess.thecvf.com/content/CVPR2023/papers/Khattak_MaPLe_Multi-Modal_Prompt_Learning_CVPR_2023_paper.pdf}{MaPLe: Multi-modal Prompt Learning - CVPR2023}
\end{itemize}

\section*{To be explored}

\begin{itemize}
\item Purpose of cardiac segmentation in clinical application; applicable medical scenario
\item MICCAI 2024 paper on SAM
\item LORA on fine tuning
\item Metric that measure accuracy for edges
\item CT set with normal patients (no CHD)
\item Feasible method for shape prior for anatomically aware block
\item Design of loss function to add shape constraint in the training loop
\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}
